name: Mad Mix 2: El Castillo de los Fantasmas
storyline:
Peace had finally come to "CocoVillage" thanks to the work done by Mad Mix, who had become a worthy successor to his grandfather. 
 
But the nightmare was not over yet because a few miles from there, in the town of his cousin Ope "CocoCastle", a place crowned by a fantasy castle, strange phenomena were happening. 
 
All the beginnings led to think that a "coconut" surviving "Cocovillage" had made the castle his home, also establishing a malefic alliance with the sinister inhabitants of that place.
summary: Second Part of Mad Mix Game 2, a pac man style game
